column4: Anyone know of a remote desktop server for Linux desktops that has a Windows client?  For example, my computer at work is Windows but I'd like to remote desktop to my Ubuntu desktop at home.  Is that possible (graphical, not ssh)
Or can I have OpenSSH server forward X sessions to PuTTY?
yes, if you're running an X server on the machine running putty
Okay, I wouldn't be, so I guess rdesktop is my answer.
